subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Aaron's Files/12-469 New Model/Can speak to me though this_Yes.mp3 
  Uploaded by : kolrone <a.cronk@...> 
  Description : I ask "Is there anyone that can speak to me though this" and I get a response, but I can't tell if the response is a yes or nos_Yes.mp3 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Aaron%27s%20Files/12-469%20New%20Model/Can%20speak%20to%20me%20though%20this_Yes.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

kolrone <a.cronk@...>
